resources.string: This app consists of Face Recognition Interface which will find the match with the user face with his uploaded image. Register first with your face.
Registration consists of few details.\nAccount number should be 11characters long. Image should be maximum of 50kb.
Live Detection:\n \tLiveliness detection is done based on the real time image/video capture. \n\tResponse for this is also given with success for a perfect match.
SBI HACKATHON\nTeam: Shirk\n Facial Recognition Security
